title: Engineering Ethics Education Design: Workshop for Strengthening Pre-Service Teacher Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Core engineering ethics principles and foundational instructional design knowledge
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment where pre-service teachers directly design engineering ethics education activities linked to peer learners and professional fields

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more creative activity designs for engineering ethics education.
Learners develop educational content based on ethical case analyses across engineering disciplines.
Learners can improve their instructional design proposals by incorporating peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
